Package com.aestus.api.attachment.controller

Class AttachmentController

java.lang.Object
com.aestus.api.attachment.controller.AttachmentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/v1/attachment") public class AttachmentController extends Object
Provides the attachment controller functionality.

    • upload

      @PostMapping("/upload") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'A\') or hasAuthority(\'U\') or hasAuthority(\'S\') or hasAuthority(\'D\') or hasAuthority(\'I\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> upload(@RequestParam("files") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] files, @RequestParam("descriptions") String[] descriptions, @RequestParam("documentType") String documentType, @RequestParam("documentId") int documentId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Upload attachments.
      Parameters:
      files - the files to be uploaded
      descriptions - the corresponding file descriptions
      documentType - the type of document the files are attached to
      documentId - the id of document the files are attached to
      request - the http request
      Returns:
      the response entity
